cgroup-mode.description: The cgroup mode the node operates under (when type == node).
cgroup-mode.name: cgroup-mode

content.description: Allowed storage content types (when type == storage).
content.name: content

disk.description: Used disk space in bytes (when type in storage), used root image spave for VMs (type in qemu,lxc).
disk.name: disk

hastate.description: HA service status (for HA managed VMs).
hastate.name: hastate

maxcpu.description: Number of available CPUs (when type in node,qemu,lxc).
maxcpu.name: maxcpu

maxdisk.description: Storage size in bytes (when type in storage), root image size for VMs (type in qemu,lxc).
maxdisk.name: maxdisk

maxmem.description: Number of available memory in bytes (when type in node,qemu,lxc).
maxmem.name: maxmem

mem.description: Used memory in bytes (when type in node,qemu,lxc).
mem.name: mem

node.description: The cluster node name (when type in node,storage,qemu,lxc).
node.name: node

pool.description: The pool name (when type in pool,qemu,lxc).
pool.name: pool

uptime.description: Node uptime in seconds (when type in node,qemu,lxc).
uptime.name: uptime

vmid.description: The numerical vmid (when type in qemu,lxc).
vmid.name: vmid
